de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.dimensionsimilarity

Class HSMDimensionSimilarity

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.dimensionsimilarity.HSMDimensionSimilarity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DimensionSimilarity<NumberVector>

    @Reference(authors="A. Tatu, G. Albuquerque, M. Eisemann, P. Bak, H. Theisel, M. A. Magnor, and D. A. Keim",
           title="Automated Analytical Methods to Support Visual Exploration of High-Dimensional Data",
           booktitle="IEEE Trans. Visualization and Computer Graphics, 2011",
           url="http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/TVCG.2010.242")
public class HSMDimensionSimilarity
extends Object
implements DimensionSimilarity<NumberVector>
    Compute the similarity of dimensions by using a hough transformation. Reference:

    A. Tatu, G. Albuquerque, M. Eisemann, P. Bak, H. Theisel, M. A. Magnor, and D. A. Keim.
    Automated Analytical Methods to Support Visual Exploration of High- Dimensional Data.
    IEEEVisualization and Computer Graphics, 2011.

    FIXME: This needs serious TESTING before release. Large parts have been rewritten, but could not be tested at the time of rewriting.
    Since:
    0.5.5
    Author:
    Erich Schubert, Robert RÃ¶dler

      • STATIC

        public static final HSMDimensionSimilarity STATIC
        Static instance.

      • STEPS

        private static final int STEPS
        Angular resolution. Best if divisible by 4: smaller tables. The original publication used 50.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        private static final SinCosTable table
        Precompute sinus and cosinus
